channel.title: MidwestWeekends - Travel in Minnesota, Wisconsin, Illinois, Iowa
channel.description: Up-to-date information on travel in the Upper Midwest

item.title: Ski or snowshoe by candlelight
item.description: In the winter, follow twinkling lights through snowy forests in Minnesota, Wisconsin, Michigan and Illinois.

item.title: Lodgings in Minnesota state parks
item.description: If you don't have a cabin of your own, Minnesota has one you can borrow.

item.title: Owl aboard
item.description: In southeast Minnesota, a live-wire named Alice inspired an annual festival.

item.title: Tours on two wheels
item.description: Here are the most scenic weekend bike rides in Wisconsin, Minnesota, Iowa, western Michigan and northern Illinois.

item.title: Classroom in the Clearing
item.description: In a tranquil Door County forest, students gather to reflect and learn.

item.title: Snow asylum
item.description: In northeast Wisconsin, Afterglow Lake Resort stays on top of the heap.

item.title: In the land of Norwegians
item.description: Old World traditions come with a wink in the bluff-country burg of Spring Grove.

item.title: Road trip: Wildflowers of the Mississippi Valley
item.description: A spring quest leads through Minnesota bluff country and Wisconsin river towns.

item.title: Classroom on the slopes
item.description: Alpine skiing is more fun when you learn how to do it better.

item.title: Snow heaven on the Gunflint Trail
item.description: On the edge of the Boundary Waters, cross-country skiers find snow that sparkles into April.

item.title: Skiing on Minnesota's North Shore
item.description: On snow-laden trails, cross-country skiers glide on cloud nine.

item.title: Adventure in Eagle River
item.description: Around this snowy northeast Wisconsin town, there's a trail for everyone.
